column4: I am using Jaunty on my main PC, has anyone else had a problem with the workspace switcher only showing you open apps in the "desk 1" panel even if you rotate the cube to the other desktops?
try to click on the pager and set more workspaces....
or, go to ccsm, at General Options, and see what's in there....
texajack: under ccsm it is set to 4 desktops and on my pager it is also set to 4
it's about the 'Horizontal Virtual Size', set it to 4. and Vertical to 1... And your pager to 4...
that worked, I don't know why I had desktops set to 4.
now my pager is working like it should thanks
I don't know either what's the function of the "Desktop" option....
so that option is for if I have multiple moniters set up right?
but if you wanna something cool. Set the Horiz to 4, or even 8; and Vert to 2, or even 4... It's awesome see all those "desktops" in the Expo plug-in... =)
I never gat something to work with that with more than 1 desktop....
